Package com.intellij.lang.refactoring

Interface InlineHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroovyInlineHandler, XmlInlineHandler

    public interface InlineHandler
    Interface that should be implemented by the language in order to provide inline functionality and possibly participate in inline of elements in other languages this language may reference.
    See Also:
    InlineHandlers.getInlineHandlers(com.intellij.lang.Language)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  InlineHandler.Inliner 
      static interface  InlineHandler.Settings 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default boolean canInlineElement(PsiElement element) 
      InlineHandler.Inliner createInliner(PsiElement element, InlineHandler.Settings settings) 
      InlineHandler.Settings prepareInlineElement(PsiElement element, Editor editor, boolean invokedOnReference) 
      void removeDefinition(PsiElement element, InlineHandler.Settings settings) 

    • Method Detail

      • canInlineElement

        default boolean canInlineElement(PsiElement element)

      • prepareInlineElement

        InlineHandler.Settings prepareInlineElement(PsiElement element,
                                            Editor editor,
                                            boolean invokedOnReference)
        Parameters:
        element - element to be inlined
        invokedOnReference - true if the user invoked the refactoring on an element reference
        editor - in case refactoring has been called in the editor
        Returns:
        Settings object in case refactoring should be performed or null otherwise

      • removeDefinition

        void removeDefinition(PsiElement element,
                      InlineHandler.Settings settings)
        Parameters:
        element - inlined element

      • createInliner

        InlineHandler.Inliner createInliner(PsiElement element,
                                    InlineHandler.Settings settings)
        Parameters:
        element - inlined element
        settings - inlining settings
        Returns:
        Inliner instance to be used for inlining references in this language
